--- Page 1 of Himanshu-CV.pdf ---

HIMANSHU SINGH

© 5+ Years Experience

January, 20 1997 © +91 8076188344
&) Delhi, India © hsingh4u10@gmail.com

 

PHP & WordPress Developer

Proficient and creative WordPress developer with a strong knowledge in Custom Wordpress theme
and plugin development. Experienced in creating Ecommerce, Donation and Listing Platform websites
from scratch using latest technologies. Expert in all aspects of WordPress website creation, including
design, plugins, customization and implementation.

oO Career Highlights

e From Nov 2016-17 worked as Web Designer for Gingerwebs.
e From May 2017-19 worked as WordPress Developer & Web Designer for Witoni Infratech Pvt. Ltd

e From September 2019 working in Slidesigma as Sr. Wordpress Developer.

© Key skills

WordPress Development Skills

e WordPress Custom Theme Development from scratch

e Extensive experience to create WordPress Elementor Theme, WP Bakery Theme with additional option
panel using Redux Framework

e Having experience to create custom Elements/Shortcodes using WP Bakery and Elementor Plugins
with advanced level features

e Wordpress Theme & Plugin Customization

e Build high quality Themes and E-Commerce Portals for the client and marketplaces
(Themeforest/Templatemonster) and developed fully backend functionalities with additional plugin
compatibility

e Experience in Ul/UX designing using HTMLS5, CSS3, Bootstrap, Jquery,

e Ability to create Ajax functionalities like Search form, Login/Register form, Pagination and more
e Custom widgets for custom post types and other website features

e Experience to create wordpress products for marketplaces like Themeforest & Templatemonster

e Created WordPress themes in Donations, Hotel Booking, Ecommerce and Listings categories

e Ability to build solutions that cater for cross-platform and cross-browser differences and debugging
site issues

e Ability to create Multisite website product

e Knowledge of Object Oriented Programming with custom plugin development in PHP and MySQL
e Ability to integrate and customize third party plugins into website

e Optimized website loading time performance
